entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: NW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
